DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the safety and efficacy of interferon beta-1a in maintaining remission in patients with Crohn's disease.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of Treatment With Interferon Beta-1a RebifÂ® in Patients With Crohn's Disease
DOC.criteria: Patients with an established diagnosis of Crohn's disease who went into remission using corticosteroids within 4 weeks before the study Any other treatment for the maintenance of remission of Crohn's disease
